name: frenzy-furs
description: A Discord Bot for the Fuzzy Furs Discord Server!
author: Jason Diaz Jimenez <vulpothedev@gmail.com> (https://vulpo.xyz)

scripts.dev: yarn clean; yarn compile; NODE_ENV=development yarn start
scripts.prod: yarn clean; yarn compile; NODE_ENV=production yarn start
scripts.dev:win: yarn clean:win && yarn compile && yarn start
